summary: Our heroes must protect the Prince of the Sea, Manaphy, from the evil pirate Phantom, and return the young Pokémon to the Sea Temple with the help of the the People of the Water and Jackie the Pokémon Ranger.
cast: Sarah Natochenny|Michele Knotz|Kayzie Rogers|Bill Rogers|Eric Schussler|Rich McNanna|James Carter Cathcart|Rodger Parsons|Sean Kenin|Natasha Charles Parker|Emlyn Elisabeth Morinelli|Craig Blair|Annie Silver|Simcha Whitehill|Becky|Jason Flores Contreras|Hiroshi Fujioka|Michael Haigney|Megumi Hayashibara|Inuko Inuyama|Unshô Ishizuka|Miyako Ito|Kaori|Takafumi Kawakami|Rachael Lillis|Kaori Manabe|Rica Matsumoto|Armen Mazlumian|Shin'ichirô Miki|Riichi Nishimoto|Daisuke Sakaguchi|Kôichi Sakaguchi|Tomoyuki Shimura|Yuri Shiratori|Yûji Ueda|Kyôko Yamada|Kôichi Yamadera|Ikue Ôtani
title: Pokémon 9: Pokémon Ranger y el Templo del Mar
